flawed_nl_solution:
The bus started with 50 people - 15 who got off at the first stop = <<50-15=38>>38 people on the bus.
At the second stop, 38 people on the bus - 8 who got off = <<38-8=30>>30 people.
Then there were 30 people + 2 who got on = <<30+2=32>>32 people on the bus.
At the third stop, 32 people on the bus - 4 who got off = <<32-4=28>>28 people on the bus.
Then there were 28 people on the bus + 3 who got on = <<28+3=31>>31 people on the bus.
#### 31

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 38. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
